# Strategy: Master Portfolio V1 (Invest Copy)
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/pWMLnAV6Nx2eCWWJKL2s/details

**Complexity**: High (9/10)
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 57 assets:

• **Stocks**: SPY, VIXY, TLT, BTAL, IOO, QQQ, VTV, VOX, XLP, XLF, FNGA, LLY, NVO, COST, PGR, IWM, VWO, XLE, XHB, TQQQ, TECL, XLK, BIL, GLD, XME, SLV, DBC, AGG, SH, TBT, SPXL, SOXL, GE, PSQ, SPHB, SQQQ, IEF, QID, KMLM, SPXU, TECS, SOXS, FNGD, TMV, SMH, SVXY, VTI, XLU, TMF, BND, UUP, RINF, EEM, IEI, EDC, EDZ, CORP

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ Master Portfolio V1:
    ▪ Equal Weight Allocation:
      - If :
        - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 80.0:
          - VIX Blend+:
            - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
              - Buy VIXY (75% of portfolio)
              - Alternate:
                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                  - Buy TLT (100% of portfolio)
                  - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
        - Else branch:
          - Equal Weight Allocation:
            - If :
              - If IOO's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 80.0:
                - VIX Blend+:
                  - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                    - Buy VIXY (75% of portfolio)
                    - Alternate:
                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                        - Buy TLT (100% of portfolio)
                        - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
              - Else branch:
                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                  - If :
                    - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 79.0:
                      - Scale-In | VIX -> VIX+:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - If :
                            - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 82.5:
                              - VIX Blend+:
                                - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                                  - Buy VIXY (75% of portfolio)
                                  - Alternate:
                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                      - Buy TLT (100% of portfolio)
                                      - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                            - Else branch:
                              - VIX Blend:
                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                  - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                  - Alternate:
                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                      - Buy TLT (100% of portfolio)
                                      - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                    - Else branch:
                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                        - If :
                          - If VTV's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 79.0:
                            - VIX Blend:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                - Alternate:
                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                    - Buy TLT (100% of portfolio)
                                    - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                          - Else branch:
                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                              - If :
                                - If VOX's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 79.0:
                                  - VIX Blend:
                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                      - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                      - Alternate:
                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                          - Buy TLT (100% of portfolio)
                                          - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                - Else branch:
                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                    - If :
                                      - If XLP's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 77.0:
                                        - VIX Blend:
                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                            - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                            - Alternate:
                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                - Buy TLT (100% of portfolio)
                                                - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                      - Else branch:
                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                          - If :
                                            - If XLF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 81.0:
                                              - VIX Blend:
                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                  - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                  - Alternate:
                                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                      - Buy TLT (100% of portfolio)
                                                      - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                            - Else branch:
                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                - If :
                                                  - If FNGA's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 83.0:
                                                    - VIX Blend:
                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                        - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                        - Alternate:
                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                            - Buy TLT (100% of portfolio)
                                                            - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                  - Else branch:
                                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                      - If :
                                                        - If VIXY's cumulative-return is greater than 20.0:
                                                          - High Vol Strat:
                                                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                              - If :
                                                                - If SPY's current-price is greater than SPY's moving-average-price:
                                                                  - JRT:
                                                                    - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
                                                                      (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
                                                                      Assets: LLY, NVO, COST, PGR
                                                                      - Buy LLY (40% of portfolio)
                                                                      - Buy NVO (100% of portfolio)
                                                                      - Buy COST (100% of portfolio)
                                                                      - Buy PGR (100% of portfolio)
                                                                  - Ticker Mixer:
                                                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                      - Select the bottom 3 assets by returns (10-day) from: SPY, QQQ, IWM, VWO, XLE, XHB, XLP
                                                                - Else branch:
                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                    - If :
                                                                      - If TQQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is less than 30.0:
                                                                        - QQQ 1.5:
                                                                          - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                                                                            - Buy TQQQ (25% of portfolio)
                                                                            - Buy QQQ (75% of portfolio)
                                                                        - XLK 1.5:
                                                                          - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                                                                            - Buy TECL (25% of portfolio)
                                                                            - Buy XLK (75% of portfolio)
                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                          - If :
                                                                            - If VIXY's cumulative-return is greater than 25.0:
                                                                              - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                              - Buy BIL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                            - Else branch:
                                                                              - JRT:
                                                                                - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
                                                                                  (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
                                                                                  Assets: LLY, NVO, COST, PGR
                                                                                  - Buy LLY (40% of portfolio)
                                                                                  - Buy NVO (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                  - Buy COST (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                  - Buy PGR (100% of portfolio)
                                                                              - Ticker Mixer:
                                                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                  - Select the bottom 3 assets by returns (10-day) from: SPY, QQQ, IWM, VWO, XLE, XHB, XLP
                                                        - Else branch:
                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                            - If :
                                                              - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 62.0:
                                                                - Overbought:
                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                    - Buy GLD (50% of portfolio)
                                                                    - DBC/SLV/VIX:
                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                        - VIX Stuff:
                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                            - If :
                                                                              - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 60.0:
                                                                                - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                                              - Else branch:
                                                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                  - If :
                                                                                    - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 80.0:
                                                                                      - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                    - Else branch:
                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                        - If :
                                                                                          - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 90.0:
                                                                                            - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                          - Else branch:
                                                                                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                              - If :
                                                                                                - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 95.0:
                                                                                                  - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                - Else branch:
                                                                                                  - Buy XME (100% of portfolio)
                                                                        - Buy SLV (20% of portfolio)
                                                                        - Buy DBC (15% of portfolio)
                                                              - Else branch:
                                                                - Strategies:
                                                                  - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                                                                    - Aggressive:
                                                                      - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                                                                        - 20/60 Machine:
                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                            - If :
                                                                              - If SPY's current-price is greater than SPY's moving-average-price:
                                                                                - 20/60:
                                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                    - If :
                                                                                      - If AGG's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than SH's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                        - Moderated Ticker Mixer:
                                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                            - If :
                                                                                              - If TQQQ's max-drawdown is less than 15.0:
                                                                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                  - If :
                                                                                                    - If TBT's cumulative-return is less than 10.0:
                                                                                                      - Ticker Mixer:
                                                                                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                          - Bottom 3 CR:
                                                                                                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                              - Select the bottom 3 assets by cumulative-return (10-day) from: SPXL, TQQQ, TECL, SOXL, FNGA
                                                                                                          - Buy FNGA (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                    - Else branch:
                                                                                                      - JRT:
                                                                                                        - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
                                                                                                          (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
                                                                                                          Assets: LLY, NVO, COST
                                                                                                          - Buy LLY (40% of portfolio)
                                                                                                          - Buy NVO (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                          - Buy COST (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                          - PGR || GE:
                                                                                                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                              - Select the top 1 asset by returns (10-day) from: PGR, GE
                                                                                              - Else branch:
                                                                                                - JRT:
                                                                                                  - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
                                                                                                    (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
                                                                                                    Assets: LLY, NVO, COST
                                                                                                    - Buy LLY (40% of portfolio)
                                                                                                    - Buy NVO (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                    - Buy COST (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                    - PGR || GE:
                                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                        - Select the top 1 asset by returns (10-day) from: PGR, GE
                                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                                        - Buy PSQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                              - Else branch:
                                                                                - Bear | 21/21:
                                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                    - If :
                                                                                      - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is less than 31.0:
                                                                                        - Pick Bottom 3:
                                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                            - Select the bottom 3 assets by returns (10-day) from: SPXL, TQQQ, TECL, SOXL, FNGA
                                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                          - If :
                                                                                            - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is less than 30.0:
                                                                                              - Pick Bottom 3:
                                                                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                  - Select the bottom 3 assets by returns (10-day) from: SPXL, TQQQ, TECL, SOXL, FNGA
                                                                                            - Else branch:
                                                                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                - If :
                                                                                                  - If FNGA's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is less than 30.0:
                                                                                                    - Pick Bottom 3:
                                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                        - Select the bottom 3 assets by returns (10-day) from: SPXL, TQQQ, TECL, SOXL, FNGA
                                                                                                  - Else branch:
                                                                                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                      - If :
                                                                                                        - If QQQ's cumulative-return (60-day) is less than -12.0:
                                                                                                          - 21/21:
                                                                                                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                              - If :
                                                                                                                - If AGG's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than SPHB's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                                                  - Buy SPHB (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                                - Else branch:
                                                                                                                  - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                        - Else branch:
                                                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                            - If :
                                                                                                              - If TQQQ's current-price is greater than TQQQ's moving-average-price (20-day):
                                                                                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                                  - If :
                                                                                                                    - If PSQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is less than 32.5:
                                                                                                                      - Buy SQQQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                                    - Else branch:
                                                                                                                      - 10/20 -> CR:
                                                                                                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                                          - If :
                                                                                                                            - If IEF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than PSQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                                                              - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                                            - Else branch:
                                                                                                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                                                - If :
                                                                                                                                  - If TQQQ's cumulative-return (10-day) is greater than 15.0:
                                                                                                                                    - Buy SQQQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                                                  - Else branch:
                                                                                                                                    - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                              - Else branch:
                                                                                                                - 21/21:
                                                                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                                    - If :
                                                                                                                      - If AGG's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than SPHB's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                                                        - Buy PSQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                                                                        - Buy QID (100% of portfolio)
                                                                        - KMLM Variants:
                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                            - SPY vs KMLM:

                                                                                - If :
                                                                                  - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than KMLM's RSI (Relative Strength Index):

                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                        - Bottom 3 CR:

                                                                                        - Buy TECL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                  - Else branch:
                                                                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                      - If :

                                                                                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                              - Bottom 3 CR:
                                                                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                  - Select the bottom 3 assets by cumulative-return (10-day) from: SPXL, TQQQ, TECL, SOXL, FNGA

                                                                                        - Else branch:
                                                                                          - Ticker Mixer - Short:

                                                                                                      - Select the bottom 3 assets by returns (10-day) from: SPXU, SQQQ, TECS, SOXS, FNGD

                                                                              - Else branch:

                                                                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                - If :
                                                                                                  - If IEF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than PSQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                                    - Ticker Mixer:
                                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                        - Bottom 3 CR:
                                                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                            - Select the bottom 3 assets by cumulative-return (10-day) from: SPXL, TQQQ, TECL, SOXL, FNGA
                                                                                                        - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                  - Else branch:
                                                                                                    - Buy PSQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                    - Balance:
                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                        - JRT:
                                                                          - Allocate using inverse volatility weighting
                                                                            (Lower volatility assets get higher weights)
                                                                            Assets: LLY, NVO, COST, PGR
                                                                            - Buy LLY (40% of portfolio)
                                                                            - Buy NVO (100% of portfolio)
                                                                            - Buy COST (100% of portfolio)
                                                                            - Buy PGR (100% of portfolio)
                                                                        - SVXY FTLT:
                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                            - If :
                                                                              - If QQQ's cumulative-return is less than -4.0:
                                                                                - Mean Reversion:
                                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                    - If :
                                                                                      - If TQQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is less than 30.0:
                                                                                        - Ticker Mixer:
                                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                            - Bottom 3 CR:
                                                                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                - Select the bottom 3 assets by cumulative-return (10-day) from: SPXL, TQQQ, TECL, SOXL, FNGA
                                                                                            - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                                        - SVXY FTLT:
                                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                            - If :
                                                                                              - If SVXY's current-price is greater than SVXY's moving-average-price:
                                                                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                  - Select the top 1 asset by returns (10-day) from: SVXY, VTI
                                                                                              - Else branch:
                                                                                                - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                              - Else branch:
                                                                                - SVXY FTLT:
                                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                    - If :
                                                                                      - If SVXY's current-price is greater than SVXY's moving-average-price:
                                                                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                          - Select the top 1 asset by returns (10-day) from: SVXY, VTI
                                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                                        - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                        - Foreign RINF:
                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                            - If :
                                                                              - If RINF's current-price is greater than RINF's moving-average-price:
                                                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                  - If :
                                                                                    - If EEM's current-price is greater than EEM's moving-average-price:
                                                                                      - IEI vs IWM:
                                                                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                          - If :
                                                                                            - If IEI's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than IWM's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                              - Buy EDC (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                            - Else branch:
                                                                                              - Buy EDZ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                    - Else branch:
                                                                                      - IEF vs SPY:
                                                                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                          - If :
                                                                                            - If IEF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                              - Buy EDC (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                            - Else branch:
                                                                                              - Buy EDZ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                      - CORP vs SPY:
                                                                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                          - If :
                                                                                            - If CORP's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                              - Buy EDC (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                            - Else branch:
                                                                                              - Buy EDZ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                              - Else branch:
```
